name: Super Mega Wild Run
description:
This game is made for Super Game Pack 1.

Super Mega Wild Run is an endless runner in space. Avoid red pills and collect green ones. Try to survive on the wild road as long as you can.

Controls:

W / Up Arrow: thrust
A / Left Arrow: turn left
D / Right Arrow: turn right

Credits:

Programming: Neslihan Aydınoğlu
Music: Eric Skiff
